name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_ADDL_VERIF
description: This table stores information about additional counts verification staff.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_VERIFIED_BY_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID for additional staff that verified a count.
